summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West 62nd Street, from 37th Avenue Northwest to a point 310 feet east of 34th Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7075 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
